#summary How to work with AR.

= Introduction =

 *  In order to reproduce the demonstration of youtube video ([http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bmgThis_Dmo]) you must use Eclipse Helios and checkout the source code from HEAD ([https://ejj.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/])

 * How to create your own marker? [http://www.artoolworks.com/support/library/Creating_and_training_new_ARToolKit_markers]
 * Configuring video capture in ARToolKit Professional on Linux [http://www.artoolworks.com/support/library/Configuring_video_capture_in_ARToolKit_Professiona]
 * How to setup correctly Eclipse + Java3D + java.library.path [http://www.filsa.net/2008/07/17/eclipse-java3d-and-javalibrarypath/]

= Webcam =

 * We suggest to use a webcam with at least 1.3 Mega pixel of resolution. At our tests we used the embedded webcam from MacBook as well as Microsoft Life Cam 2000
